text: Futhi uma nesaba uqhekeko phakathi kwabo bobabili ngakho- ke thumelani umahlukanisi ophuma phakathi kwabantu bakhe (owesilisa) nomahlukanisi ophuma phakathi kwabantu bakhe, uma bobabili befuna ukubuyisana uMvelinqangi ozokwenza (kube impumelelo) phakathi kwabo bobabili ngempela uMvelinqangi uyisazi unobuhlakani
